definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Virus-infected emails struck fear into the Microsoft Company.
sentences.chinese: 携带病毒的电子邮件引起了微软公司的恐慌。

sentences.english: I do my e-mail on a 20-inch liquid crystal display (LCD) monitor.
sentences.chinese: 现在我在20英寸的液晶显示器上发电子邮件。

sentences.english: Turn off the notification function on your email program.
sentences.chinese: 关掉电子邮件程序的自动通知功能。

sentences.english: And I'm worried about e-mail! Talk about pricking my pomposity.
sentences.chinese: 用电子邮件不行吗，谈论一下对我自大的打击。
请把这个通知用电子邮件发给各位经理。

sentences.english: Do something other than check your email when you wake.
sentences.chinese: 醒来时随便做点什么，但不要去翻看你的电子邮件。

sentences.english: Unable to send test Message. Please verify the E-mail Address field.
sentences.chinese: 无法发送测试消息，请检查“电子邮件地址”字段。

sentences.english: E-mail addresses can have several forms, even though there is a standard format.
sentences.chinese: 电子邮件地址有多种格式，但是有一种标准格式。

sentences.english: S. was considering compulsory Iraq service for its diplomatic corps, but thee-mails sparked outrage nevertheless.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这些电子邮件还是引发了一片愤怒。

sentences.english: 'What about sending a message via email?' suggested Mr. Tompkins.
sentences.chinese: “如果是发送一条电子邮件消息呢？”汤普金斯建议。

sentences.english: Email involves attachments, and users need to print files that they receive.
sentences.chinese: 电子邮件可能包含附件，用户需要打印接收的文件。

sentences.english: Ane-mail address of the organization responsible for correspondence related to the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 有关展览的电子邮件通讯地址的组织工作。

sentences.english: I got a letter yesterday. The letter was sent bye-mail.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天收到一封信，那信是电子邮件。

sentences.english: Facebook insists that the emails and contract are fabricated. In an email to Mashable a Facebook representative said
sentences.chinese: 坚持认为电子邮件和合同是伪造的。

sentences.english: But the choices among such local email programs are dwindling.
sentences.chinese: 不过本地电子邮件程序的选择面却变得越来越窄了。

sentences.english: You have to edit it quickly for a blog entry, a presentation or your grand-ma, who learned to send emails.
sentences.chinese: 隆重介绍你要编辑的博客条目，很快发送电子邮件。

definition: email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
